goal.ch: "This course examines theory and research related to the study of behavior in and of organizational systems.  The purposes of this course are to provide you with a broad perspective of the field of organizational behavior and to promote your understanding of the interrelationships between variables at the individual, group, and organizational levels of analysis."

The purposes of this course are to provide you with a broad perspective of the field of organizational behavior and to promote your understanding of the interrelationships between variables at the individual, group, and organizational levels of analysis."
